W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_TITLE.speaker: UI
W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_TITLE.text: Pandora on the Cruise Ship and Warrior's Darkness

W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_DETAI.speaker: UI
W13_EVAR_SIUG_ROUTE0_FERRY_END_100_DETAI.text: You found Pandora on the cruise ship, but is it really possible to close it? And can Warrior face the darkness he created?

W13_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W13_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: The Crowrealm: The World of Sand

W13_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a world covered in sand on the other side of the door. The truth behind Warrior's darkness lies somewhere beneath the dunes.
